seekers.name: Jane Doe
seekers.headline: Senior Security Engineer
seekers.skills: Application security, threat modeling, code review, Python, AWS
seekers.experience_summary: 8+ years in AppSec, leading security reviews and building secure SDLC practices.
seekers.about:
## About

I am a security engineer focused on helping teams build and ship secure applications without slowing them down. I enjoy collaborating with developers, improving tooling, and making security approachable.

## Highlights

- Led application security program for a multi-team engineering org
- Built internal security champions program
- Comfortable with cloud-native stacks (AWS, Kubernetes)
